entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Flurries south of the Yellowhead Highway near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm south of the Yellowhead Highway. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:15 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 12:15 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
